Parse the XML files from YR.no.

```{r loadpackage}

library(yrno)

```

## Examples

Return only the forecast data.

```{r nolist}

str(yr())

```

Return a list with location and forecast data. Credit, links and meta data in the XML file are not parsed yet.

```{r list}

str(yr(return_location = TRUE))


```
